revised_title: On the Induction of Electric Currents and the Evolution of Electricity from Magnetism
tldr: Faraday's experimental research explores the induction of electric currents and the evolution of electricity from magnetism. He discovers that electric currents induce a magnetic field and that a changing magnetic field can induce an electric current. This work laid the foundation for the principles of electromagnetic induction and the understanding of the relationship between electricity and magnetism.
